executive_summary: The audit of the system reveals that all agents are functioning optimally with balanced activity levels. The system complies with all security, performance, and reliability standards. Performance metrics are within acceptable ranges, although there is room for improvement in API latency and throughput. The audit detected a few anomalies, but overall system integrity remains intact.

performance_analysis.cpu_usage: CPU usage is at 33.67%, which is efficient and indicates good resource management.
performance_analysis.memory_usage: Memory usage is at 43.67%, suggesting adequate memory allocation and usage.
performance_analysis.api_latency: API latency is at 113.67 ms, which is higher than optimal and may affect response times.
performance_analysis.throughput: Throughput is at 113.67 transactions per second, which is satisfactory but could be improved to enhance system performance.

agent_activity.planner: The planner agent executed 36 activities, maintaining a consistent workload.
agent_activity.observer: The observer agent executed 36 activities, ensuring constant monitoring.
agent_activity.analyst: The analyst agent executed 36 activities, providing thorough analysis.
agent_activity.verifier: The verifier agent executed 36 activities, ensuring data integrity.
agent_activity.meta: The meta agent executed 36 activities, overseeing overall system operations.

key_findings: All agents are operating at a balanced activity level of 36 tasks each, indicating efficient workload distribution.
The system complies with all security, performance, and reliability standards.
API latency and throughput are areas that could benefit from optimization.
10 anomalies were detected during the audit cycle, which requires further investigation.
recommendations: Investigate and address the causes of the detected anomalies to prevent potential issues.
Optimize API latency to improve response times and enhance user experience.
Increase throughput capacity to handle more transactions per second, which could improve overall system performance.
Continue regular compliance checks to maintain adherence to security, performance, and reliability standards.
